title: Amazon Basics AA 1.5 Volt Performance Alkaline Batteries, 20-Pack (Appearance may vary)
raw_desc: One 20-pack AA 1.5-volt performance alkaline batteries for reliable performance across a wide range of devices 10-year leak-free shelf life; air- and liquid-tight seal locks in the power until it’s needed thanks to the improved design, which includes dual crimps, a new zinc composition, and anti-corrosion components Delivers the amount of power needed for a specific device; ideal for game controllers, toys, flashlights, digital cameras, clocks, and more Ships in Certified Frustration-Free Packaging Note: these batteries are NOT rechargeable. For reusable options, check out Amazon Basics rechargeable batteries
features: One 20-pack AA 1.5-volt performance alkaline batteries for reliable performance across a wide range of devices
